modName: Furyan Race based of Riddick films
summary: The player is the last survivor of the race furyana, The furyan race future depends on you!
descriptionHtml:
Description

Descendants of Furya, a town destroyed long ago by the Red Guards, however this land has an extremely inhospitable habitat and very compatible with life, high radiation, toxic elements, with hard floors and low fertility so settlers decided to settle there were strong people with a strong will by which resisted for generations the harsh punishment that was daily life, yet every generation was stronger and resistant to previous eventually giving rise to a powerful lineage by nature, with high tolerance to pain, acute senses and intelligence, warrior instincts and a tremendous force of will that put them well above the inhabitants of other lands. The player is the last survivor of the race furyana, The furyan race future depends on you!

Base Stats:

One-handed +8
Archery +3
Light Armor +3
Lockpick +5
Discretion +10
Eloquence +1
Theft +5
Total Skill Bonus = 35 (Just like vanilla races)

Race perks:

*Furyan Vision (Riddick Vision , night eye mejorate): Lets see how Riddick, better night vision.
*Furyan Discretion (Invisibility Mejorate): Transforms the player to invisible, only turns off when you attack an enemy.
*Born to fight: Furyano attacks are much more rapid than the vanilla races, pose health and more endurance than vanilla races.


    The mod Includes:
*furyan race  male and female

*furyan eyes: Number 0 in the racemenu (Color Eyes Slider)

*custom skeleton: characters stronger, lorefriendly whit the furyan riddick,  and compatible with Schlongs. And custom skin whit female version

*linwe retex to black to more inmersion

*21 character Preset




Recommended Mods:


*Chronicles of Riddick - Ulak Blade , for more inmersion : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19931//?


*Long Cape Vie Edition , for more inmersion: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33918//?




Requirements Mods:


- ApachiiSkyHair
- ApachiiSkyHair Males
- ApachiiSkyHair Females
- A legal copy of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim (Patch 1.9 or up recommended)
-RaceCompatibility (Higly Recommended)


Installation:

-Drop to data folder.


Thanks  for view!!!
